roleset.name: to disagree

example.name: with Arg1
example.text: Fed Vice Chairman Manuel Johnson , who [*T*-98] had dissented from the Treasury 's policy , told lawmakers , `` I became convinced about what [*T*-99] looked to me like an attempt [*] to push the dollar down against the fundamentals in the market . ''
example.arg: who -> Fed Vice Chairman Manuel Johnson

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Britain 's Prime Minister Thatcher alone dissented .

roleset.note: Frames file for 'dissent' based on WSJ; nominal 'dissension' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls correspond-36.1.

example.name: nominal rel: dissension
example.text: And in that moment of existential bliss, Malak solidified his dissention from the Jedi.
